code: import axios from'axios';const API_ROOT='/api/';export const fetchProjects=function(){let categoryId=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;const url=categoryId?"".concat(API_ROOT,"projects/?categories=").concat(categoryId):"".concat(API_ROOT,"projects/");return axios.get(url);};export const fetchCategories=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_ROOT,"categories/"));
